entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:24 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then freezing rain changing to rain then changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 early this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
